achievementText: Congrats Donor! You have successfully donated blood 10 times!
There is no stopping a Champion! Congrats on completing 50 donations
Wow! Dear Donor you have successfully saved 100 lives and on your way to saving more.
Congratulations on earning your 250 donations badge! Your generosity shines brightly.
Wow! 500 donations - your generosity is truly inspiring. Congratulations on this remarkable achievement!
Dear Donor you are a true hero and a saviour. Congratulations on saving 1000 lives and recieving the highest honorary badge
Congrats Donor! You have successfully made 10 new Donor friends!
There's no slowing down an excellent Socializer! Congratulations on forging 50 new friendships!
Here's to your 100 Friendships: Building Bridges, One Connection at a Time!
